biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Kurt Voss (born 1963) is an American film director, screenwriter and musician/songwriter. He often works with fellow UCLA alumnus Allison Anders. Voss's credits include: Border Radio, Poison Ivy: The New Seduction, Where The Day Takes You, and Sugar Town.

Born as Kurt Christopher Peter WÃ¶ssner, Voss is a founding member of the West Coast punk band The Hindi Guns
